New Records: Virat Kohli became the highest run-getter in T20 World Cups
Key Match Events: Litton Das was run out by a direct hit from KL Rahul
Bangladesh lost six wickets for 40 runs in 33 deliveries
Arshdeep Singh delivered excellent yorkers at the death
Pre-Game Insights: Shakib calls correct at the toss and chooses to bowl first
Rohit says he would have batted first anyway because "it looks like a good pitch" and "runs on the board always matters"
Post-Match Reflections: India secured a hard-fought five-run victory, to take them to the top of Group 2
Bangladesh fans know this pain. They know the feeling of being in a good position against India, before the opposition find a way to get back into the game and deny them
Miscellaneous Highlights: The rain interrupted and curtailed the match
The groundstaff seem to be taking covers off
A greasy outfield means India's bowlers might find it tough to grip the ball
